name: Carlos André Sabino
description: With 15 years of experience in Support, Operations and VoIP/SaaS solutions, I combine infrastructure vision with the agility of modern development. Currently, I work as CTO and Full-Stack Developer, leading the architecture of the DocSend accounting ERP and the Aurora's Aesthetic system. Specialist in the Java and React/Next.js ecosystem, I focus on building high-availability systems, applying a 360º view from code to cloud to ensure scalability and performance.
